description: The high cuff offers good stability and the unhinged design suits either skate or classic skiiing. Warm liners prevent cold-toes and the simple lace-up closure makes them quick to get off at the end of the day.Uppers are Salomon kid fit.Insulated with a warm Thermic liner.Sanitized anti-bacterial treatment keeps inners odour-free.Hypersoft 5mm insole.Thermo-formed internal heel counter creates a custom fit that keep the heel from shifting.Prolink outsoles provide a low-profile boot-binding connection that is compatible with Salomon Prolink bindings and other bindings on the market using a 2 rail system.
name: Salomon Team Junior Prolink Ski Boots - Children to Youths
